title: electromagnetic field feeds
extract: An electromagnetic field (also EMF or EM field) is a physical field produced by electrically charged objects. ... The way in which charges and currents interact with the electromagnetic field is described by Maxwell's equations and the Lorentz force law.
extract_html: An electromagnetic field (also EMF or EM field) is a physical field produced by electrically charged objects. ... The way in which charges and currents interact with the electromagnetic field is described by Maxwell's equations and the Lorentz force law.
